Shareholder Name: Turki Ibn Mohammed Ibn Fahd Ibn Abdel Aziz Al Saud
Abdulmohsen Saad Abdul Aziz Al Ruwaished

Description: Eastern Province Cement Co (known as: EPCCO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. EPCCO operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Yemen, working on Building Products, Commodity Chemicals, Independent Power Producers and Energy Traders and Construction Materials. EPCCO is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1983.
